title: Not in safe area-bordels around, no wall on toilets
text: I am surprised how someone can destroy very well done rooms and facilities with stupid toilet design with glass wall!!! We were with kids and it was not possible to use toilet/shower without the other leave the room:-(. I bought glue tape and use sheet and put it over the glass wall as they don’t have curtain on glass wall:-(. Restoran is not walking during day/night and the area is full of strange young people walking around and visiting prostitutes in brothels

title: Great experience- very good taste
text: My kids were enjoying it, so we had to return back send day. Would probably come back again. Great experience showing preparation process. We have been offered free coffee waiting for kids to be served by personnel assisting service. This was very pleasant and not usual experience, so I am thankful and they bought me with this move (otherwise I would take it somewhere else). Great quality of ice cream.

title: Delicious Baklava - one of the best in Athen
text: We returned back for Baklava. Great portion with great quality. Recommend after lunch in center for coffee and sweet.

title: Touristic place but food was great
text: The best greek salad served in this big touristic place. They have big traffic so food is fresh but surprisingly very good quality.

title: Great small restoran wit very good service
text: Service was very good, young people taking care if everything. Food is also nice, kids enjoyed burgers in pitta and homemade potatoes. Squid was missing some extra olive oil and garlic to be better taste and was tough little bit. But I would ho again for sure.

title: Great experience- must see
text: Place you have to see, you should take some tour to learn about history of that hill. It is amazing place

title: Nice value for money
text: Solid restoran in touristic crowded part of Athen. Nothing special to mention, but no complaints as well. Moussaka had too much cheese and lower potato- don’t like that way but that is traditional greek moussaka. Souvlaki was very good!

title: Great “Janjetina ispod peke”
text: Coming there around 5 pm which was too early to enjoy in speciality (veal cooked/baked four hours), but just on time to enjoy in lamb and potato. Tried also “pastrva” and was delicious as well. Only one (non-experienced) water caused that we had to wait long for orders but food was wounderfull. One hour later restoran was full and additional personel joined so they managed food and order later much better I gues. Prices are very high but I can not complaint as food was very good. They could improve service.

title: Lubin (Brancin) from oven with vegetables...delicious
text: Great seabass (Lubin/Brancin) in oven with potato and vegetables - to recomend. Service great eventhought bussy day during weekend media. See you next year!

title: Great food, risotto and spaghetti to recommend
text: Food was really great. We did call 30 minutes in advance to reserve as there was 8 of us (4 adults and 4 child). They were really friendly. Food was great especially risotto and spaghetti. Octopus was also nice. Credit Card not accepted which is still shame in some restaurant in Croatia. Take a care of this as this can refuse a lot of people- if I would know in advance, maybe I would not come - it is attitude question. Prices, not so high as quality and size are bringing value. Sine picture and invoice attached.

title: Total dissapointment
text: Being there with 5 friends, service terrible, took our order after half hour, instead of bringing cheese with wine - they did not:-(. Ordered different meals, and after half hour of waiting they told us no 2 tatar beef as somebody else ordered last 4....food we got not salty at all. I took some friend for first time and being there 2-3 times till now. At the end asked to guesture to apologize -nothing. Nobody of us will not recommend it further. Dissaster:-(

title: Touristic place/feeling but great food
text: Even thought seafood is great in this place, i would never recommend it to someone looking for experience in dinning. Service is quick and polite, but size of this place, feeling that you are just one-time customer that should eat your experience, pay and go is killing all freshness of seafood. I hate the concept but I gave them 3 only because the quality of the food

title: Don’t miss it!!!
text: Yes, it is long queue but it is worth waiting for 15 mins. If you like it and tried it in Lisbon or elsewhere, just try this one (10) and you gonna see big difference.

title: Nice small restaurant near 2nd best view in Lisbon
text: Being lucky fo get a table just 2 hours in advance (phone reservation). Not a big menu but everything was very well prepared. I would recommend black linguine with seafood.

title: Great service
text: We (couple) had a after lunch/light dinner before going back to Lisbon. Took a degustation menu with some add-ons. Foie gras soup was great as well as wine recommended. Dessert was not perfect as it looked like. But service was excellent, even thought place become crowded around 7 p.m. they covered it all.

title: Nice small touristic place but great food
text: Stop by for glass of wine and Fado singer, but tried and enjoyed nice prawns. Very good value for money. Staff very nice, helpfull and friendly. Enjoyed a lot Fado performance as well.

title: Great food & terrible service
text: Such a hood food, especially dessert ( chocolate brownie dream). But, service was really terrible as we were waiting for food an 1 hour between meals. They could organize it much better.

title: Unusual place for dining in middle of Red Light
text: Great and unusual food, being there on dinner. We had 6 meal sequence and cake at the end was fantastic. Overall, great food!

title: Tasty food
text:
Very tasty food. We very lucky to get place without reservation. Waiter did his best to find solution. Steak of cca. 1 kg was very welll prepared. Lamb was realy delicious. At the end we were surprised with home made cakes prepared using natural aditives.....and being so delicious.
Will come back for sure, as it is really near highway.

title: Not so perfect burger as the other say
text:
Service was very good, burger was OK but far from perfect. Tartar beef Italian not so good, could be better with hot toast and butter served (not offered at all).
Service/family great and feeling very good inside.
Cakes (tiramisu and chocolate) very good.

title: Tasty octopus ispod Peke
text:
Family with 4 adukts and 2 children enjoyed in tasty octopus "ispod Peke". Ordered for 4 person and that was great as we could not eat more. Service could be better (missing recomendation, smile, approach), but they were very quivk and professional. Octopus is not on menu, you have to call and order in advance (min 4 person) for another day or for dinner if you are lucky.
Salat was also very good.
Octopus for 4 person, 6 salats, 2 litre of water, 0.5 white wine house paid 600 kn. Fair price and very good value.

title: Great garden in summer time
text: Just stopped for coffe and beer and enjoyed in park/garden with kids. If we were ready to eat we would definitely stay for lunch as well. But enjoying in Graden with beer snd fredo capuccino was very good.

title: Great Greek food
text: We tried and enjoyed Creten local specialties ( even kids liked it). Setvice was also great, view magnificant and playground for kids added value.

title: Great quick pasta and sauce
text: Searching for the place being recomended while raining. Not easy to find but being persistent, it was worth it. Very nice service as well, but could me littke bit more space inside:-).
place: Dal Moro's Fresh Pasta to Go

title: Terrible dessert and too commercial
text: Very commercial and not tasty food. It is place for big groups only and not for gastronomic experience at all:-(. I would not recomend it.

title: Slow and simle but great view
text: If you want to enjoy great view, perfect place in Palaca. If you want to enjoy lunch or dinner dont go there. Understaffed. Lady is good but can not do it all alibe...

title: No.1 in Croatia and broader - confirmed
text:
Once again bring surprised by great choice of different tastes in one combination. Coming from the end...such good " rogac torta" can not be expected, egg, chicken and salad combination...,
I ll not tell more it has to be surprise for all review reader coming in order to enjoy it fully.
Great service have been expectrd and being confirmed once again.
No.1 in Croatia definitely abd I would say even broader.

title: Nothing special
text: Good lication and good choice of wine. That is it, everything else not worth to mention. Not accepting Credit cards which was big surprise

title: Great for Split
text: Great place for Split visitor tasting great Croatian wines and Croatian fiod with international taste. Great recomendation from Ranko

title: Nice Jougurt and Lungic
text: Very nice Jogurt as a starter and very tasty lungic with fair price. We enjoyed a lot snd will be back
